title: How to create and set up a child account in Windows 11
content:
Windows has allowed you to create different accounts for multiple users for a very long time, and it’s a great way to ensure family members can use the same computer without risking losing data. Each user gets their own space, so everyone can feel like they have their own PC. In Windows 11 (as well

The post How to create and set up a child account in Windows 11 appeared first on XDA.
description: Want to share your PC with your kids? Here's how to create a child account on Windows 11 so you can give them their own space.
